com.inqwell.any.channel

Class AbstractChannelDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inqwell.any.AbstractAny
      • com.inqwell.any.channel.AbstractChannelDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Any, ChannelDriver, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FIFO, HttpTunnel, RMI, Serialize, WriteCopy

    public abstract class AbstractChannelDriver
extends AbstractAny
implements ChannelDriver

                          throws AnyException
        Description copied from interface: ChannelDriver
        Reset this channel driver's write operation. The new channel driver may be subsumed into this channel driver, or this channel driver may choose to create and return a new driver altogther.

      • canShutdown

        public boolean canShutdown()
        Description copied from interface: ChannelDriver
        Test if the exchange is in a state where it can be shutdown. Some exchanges may, for example, enforce that they are empty before allowing shutdown, to avoid lost messages
        Specified by:
        canShutdown in interface ChannelDriver

      • close

        public void close()
           throws AnyException
        Description copied from interface: ChannelDriver
        Close this exchange. After calling this method the exchange may no longer accept read and write requests. If purge is true the implementation may attempt to discard any input waiting to be read, depending on its ability to do so.
        Specified by:
        close in interface ChannelDriver
        Throws:
        AnyException
